scripts.config:nocheck: rm -f wrangler.runtime.toml && cp wrangler.toml wrangler.runtime.toml && cat wrangler.prod.env.toml >> wrangler.runtime.toml
scripts.config: [ -f "wrangler.prod.env.toml" ] && npm run config:nocheck || printf "\033[31mError:\033[0m wrangler.prod.env.toml not found." && exit 1
scripts.deploy:pro: npm run config && wrangler deploy -c wrangler.runtime.toml --env=production
scripts.watch:pro: npm run config && wrangler tail -c wrangler.runtime.toml --env=production
